review: Received this as a Christmas gift!  Love it! The voice search feature worked better than anticipated.Since I 'cut the cord', I depend on Amazon Prime TV for movies and series.  Added benefit is listening to Prime Music while my Cloud photos roll through. Still learning all it can do.  Highly recommend this product.
